items: F1 student Visa - The F-1 Student Visa is the primary visa for international students who wish to pursue full-time academic studies in the United States at approved universities, colleges, schools, and language institutions. It allows students to gain access to world-class education, experience a diverse learning environment, and benefit from limited work opportunities during their studies. After graduation, F-1 visa holders may also apply for Optional Practical Training (OPT), which enables them to gain valuable work experience in their field of study, making the U.S. a popular destination for students seeking both quality education and strong career prospects.

Study Permit (Main Student Visa) in Canada

The Canada Study Permit is the main student visa that allows international students to study full-time at designated learning institutions such as universities, colleges, and vocational schools across Canada. It provides access to high-quality education along with the opportunity to work part-time during studies and full-time during scheduled breaks. One of the biggest advantages of the Canadian Study Permit is eligibility for the Post-Graduation Work Permit (PGWP), which allows graduates to gain valuable Canadian work experience for up to three years. This study-to-work pathway also opens doors to permanent residency options, making Canada one of the most attractive destinations for international students.

Student Visa (Subclass 500) in Australia

The Student Visa (Subclass 500) allows international students to study full-time in registered educational institutions across Australia, including schools, colleges, universities, and vocational training providers. This visa offers the flexibility to work part-time during studies and full-time during scheduled holidays, helping students support their living expenses while gaining work experience. After completing their studies, graduates may also be eligible for post-study work visas, providing opportunities to build a career in Australia. With its globally recognized education system, multicultural environment, and strong student support services, Australia remains a top choice for international students.
